entry.data:
SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 50S
SOUTH WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS WITH A SLIGHT CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE MID 40S
SOUTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 25 MPH, INCREASING TO 15 TO 20 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 35 MPH AFTER MIDNIGHT
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT

SHOWERS, MAINLY IN THE MORNING
HIGHS IN THE MID 50S
TEMPERATURE FALLING INTO THE UPPER 40S IN THE AFTERNOON
SOUTH WINDS AROUND 20 MPH, BECOMING WEST IN THE AFTERNOON
GUSTS UP TO 40 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN NEAR 100 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLEAR
MUCH COOLER WITH LOWS IN THE MID 20S
WEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 25 MPH

SUNNY, COOLER WITH HIGHS AROUND 40
WEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH, BECOMING SOUTHWEST IN THE AFTERNOON

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE LOWER 30S
HIGHS IN THE MID 50S

MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE LOWER 30S

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 40S

MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE LOWER 30S
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 40S

MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS AROUND 40
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 50S
